STORM_BOLT_ACKED.description: Number of tuples acked by the bolt per second.

STORM_BOLT_CAPACITY.description: Number of messages executed * average execute latency per second.

STORM_BOLT_EMITTED.description: Number of tuples emitted per bolt per second.

STORM_BOLT_EXECUTELATENCY.description: Average time to run the execute method of the bolt per second.

STORM_BOLT_EXECUTORS.description: Number of executor tasks in the bolt component.

STORM_BOLT_FAILED.description: Number of tuples failed by the bolt per second.

STORM_BOLT_PROCESSLATENCY.description: Average time of the bolt to ack a message after it was received per second.

STORM_CLUSTER_EXECUTORS.description: Total number of executors running on the cluster.

STORM_CLUSTER_SLOTS_TOTAL.description: Total number of available worker slots on the cluster.

STORM_CLUSTER_SLOTS_USED.description: Number of worker slots used on the cluster.

STORM_CLUSTER_TASKS_TOTAL.description: Total number of tasks on the cluster.

STORM_CLUSTER_TOPOLOGIES.description: Number of topologies running on the cluster.

STORM_SPOUT_ACKED.description: Number of messages acked per spout per second.

STORM_SPOUT_COMPLETELATENCY.description: Total latency for processing the message per spout per second.

STORM_SPOUT_EMITTED.description: Number of messages emitted per spout per second.

STORM_SPOUT_EXECUTORS.description: Number of executors for the spout.

STORM_SPOUT_FAILED.description: Number of messages failed per spout per second.

STORM_SPOUT_TASKS.description: Total number of tasks for the spout.

STORM_TOPOLOGY_ACKED.description: Number messages acked per topology per second.

STORM_TOPOLOGY_COMPLETELATENCY.description: Total latency for processing messages per topology per second.

STORM_TOPOLOGY_EMITTED.description: Number of messages emitted per topology per second.

STORM_TOPOLOGY_FAILED.description: Number messages failed per topology per second.

STORM_TOPOLOGY_TRANSFERRED.description: Number messages transferred per topology per second.
